Hi! I am Aniruddha Pathak. I am a doctoral student in the [Department of Statistics](https://www.stat.iastate.edu/) at [Iowa State Univerisity](https://www.iastate.edu/). 

I completed my masters degree in Statistics from [Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur](https://www.iitk.ac.in/) in 2020 and my bachelors degree with Statistics major from [Ramakrishna Mission Residential College (Autonomous), Narendrapur](https://rkmrc.in/), [University of Calcutta](https://www.caluniv.ac.in/) in 2018.
